title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has a confusing message that appears when the package name field is empty.
OB: When invoking the New Java Package wizard, the following message appears at the top: 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists'. However, this message is displayed even when the package name field is empty, which is confusing.
EB: When invoking the New Java Package wizard and the package name field is empty, no message should be displayed at the top.
SR:
To reproduce the issue in the New Package Wizard:
1. Open the New Java Package wizard.
2. Leave the package name field empty.
3. Observe the message that appears at the top.
